intro: Leroyia, commonly known as the African violet, is a genus of flowering plants native to tropical Africa. These plants are characterized by their velvety, dark green leaves and showy, tubular flowers that come in a variety of colors. Leroyia species are typically compact and thrive in warm, humid environments with bright, indirect light. They are popular houseplants due to their ornamental value and relatively easy care requirements. The flowers often bloom in clusters, adding a vibrant touch to indoor spaces.
